TopicTitle: Minmus is made of mint-flavored ice cream.

Articles.Content: I mean look at it! Minmus looks like a big ball of mint-flavored ice cream (in KSP1). In my headcanon Minmus will always be made of mint-flavored ice cream. It being glass is complete heresy (no insult intended). I am, however, ready to accept that Minmus is mostly mint-flavored ice cream, but that there is a few kilometers thick layer of glass on the surface.
Maybe the glass is just rock candy :D
